title: $:/litClock/times/-22:45-Helen Fielding
quote_last: Oh God Daniel fell about laughing when I said I could not programme video. Said he would do it for me. Still at least I have done best for Mum. It is exciting and historic when one’s friends are on TV.

title: $:/litClock/times/-22:45-Ogden Nash
quote_first: So the Lackadaisical Broadcasting Co. bids you farewell with the message that if you aren’t grateful to be living in a world where so many things to be grateful for are yours as a matter of course. Why it is now five seconds until
quote_last: o'clock and you are just an old Trojan Horse.
